entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 20. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 18.
entry.summary: Showers ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 18. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023
